name: Human And Gods
description:
In this game, you embody Alessio, a spartan with a mission : kill the minotaure.

Will you be strong enough to kill him ?

Anaëlle FALZON: Character Design / Artist ; UI Artist

Roméo MOREL: Envrionment Artist / Level Builder

Cédric DESCHOMET: Level Designer / UI Designer

Louis MAILLARD: System Developper / AI Developper / Global Developper
